title: About Breez
subtitle: Leader in air monitoring and purification
aboutText1: Breez is a leading company in air monitoring and purification, founded in 1963. We specialize in creating innovative solutions to improve air quality in homes, offices, and public spaces.
aboutText2: Our mission is to make air quality information accessible to everyone, so that everyone can make informed decisions about their health and the health of their loved ones.
aboutText3: With over 50 million users worldwide, Breez is a trusted partner for thousands of corporations, schools, hospitals, and government organizations.
careersText: Join the Breez team and help us make the air cleaner for everyone!
